titleStmt.title: The kingdome of England & principality of Wales exactly described whith every sheere & the small townes in every one of them in six mappes, portable for every mans pocket ... / described by one that trauailled throughout the whole kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Hollar, Wenceslaus, 1607-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
